live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 12:30pm. Please stay tuned for updates.
37892.summary: Some customers in the William Whyte area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37892.title: May 31 – Winnipeg (William Whyte) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 1:30pm. Please stay tuned for updates.
